first_line_en: My hope is built on nothing less
first_line_yo: Igbekele mi ko si n’nu kan

lines: My hope is built on nothing less
Than Jesus' blood and righteousness;
I dare not trust the sweetest frame,
But wholly lean on Jesus' name.
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand;
All other ground is sinking sand,
All other ground is sinking sand.
When darkness veils His lovely face,
I rest on His unchanging grace;
In every high and stormy gale,
My anchor holds within the veil.
Igbekele mi ko si n’nu kan,
Lehin eje at’ ododo Jesu;
Nko j’ori si ayo kan le,
Sugbon mo f’ori le Oruko Jesu.
Mo duro le Krist’ Apata,
Ile miran, iyanrin ni.
Ile miran, iyanrin ni.
B’ire-ije ba bo oju Re,
Mo f’ore-ofe Re t’o daju han;
N’nu iji lile at’ ide,
Irora mi duro n’nu ike.

first_line_en: Amazing grace! how sweet the sound

lines: Amazing grace! how sweet the sound,
That saved a wretch like me!
I once was lost, but now am found,
Was blind, but now I see.
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,
And grace my fears relieved;
How precious did that grace appear
The hour I first believed!
Oore-ofe t’o dun to yi,
Gba omo-ale bi emi!
Mo ti sonu, sugbon mo ri,
Mo fo, sugbon mo riran.
Oore-ofe l’o ko mi beru,
Oore-ofe l’o gba mi;
Bi oore-ofe se yo to,
Nigba mo ko gbagbo!

first_line_en: To God be the glory, great things He hath done
first_line_yo: F’Olorun l’ogo, ohun nla t’O se

lines: To God be the glory, great things He hath done,
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life an atonement for sin,
And opened the life-gate that all may go in.
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory, great things He hath done.
F’Olorun l’ogo, ohun nla t’O se;
Torí O f’awa t’O f’Omo Re fun wa,
Eni t’O f’emí Re lé’lè f’esè wa,
T’O si silekun iye f’elere gbogbo.
Yin Oluwa, yin Oluwa,
Je k’aiye gbo ohun Re!
Yin Oluwa, yin Oluwa,
Je k’eniyan yo!
O wa sodo Baba, nipa Jesu Omo,
Ki o si fun ni ogo, ohun nla t'O se.
